title: SRVI Delayed Again
summary: The world files of the new Survival Island gamemode have been deleted, and will be being rebuilt over this week.

title: SRVI Playtesting
summary: The new Survival Island gamemode has been built and will be being playtested soon.

title: New Website
summary: At the Team SMP, we've been working on a new website.

title: Update on SRVI
summary: The new Survival Island gamemode of the Team SMP has started being built.
